question.title: Daemon compilation failed: Could not connect to Kotlin compile daemon
question.body:
I tried to build my project as an APK file so I could transfer it to my phone and test it to make sure it worked in more than the emulator, and I was given this error. I'm new to Android Studio and Kotlin, and I followed an online tutorial. A little bit of help would be nice. If needed, I can provide my :app build.gradle.kts and activity_main.xml for further help and advice.

Build Output:

e: Daemon compilation failed: Could not connect to Kotlin compile daemon
java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not connect to Kotlin compile daemon
    at org.jetbrains.kotlin.compilerRunner.GradleCompilerRunnerWithWorkers$GradleKotlinCompilerWorkAction.execute(GradleCompilerRunnerWithWorkers.kt:76)

Using fallback strategy: Compile without Kotlin daemon

exception:         var result : 0.0
exception:                      ^

exception:         binding.resultTv.text = "Result is $result"
exception:                          ^
exception: app\src\main\java\com\[REDACTED]\exprack_expensetracker\MainActivity.kt:51:45: error: variable 'result' must be initialized
exception:         binding.resultTv.text = "Result is $result"
exception:                                             ^

> Task :app:compileDebugKotlin FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.
